node.title: AdBlue 'price gouging' won't be solved easily, says haulage company
node.description: A nationalÂ milk haulage company says an extra two weeks' supply of AdBlue from Indonesia won't solve "price gauging" being experienced in Australia for the scarce diesel exhaust fluid.
node.content:
["A national\u00a0milk haulage company says an extra two weeks' supply of AdBlue from Indonesia won't solve \"price gauging\" being experienced in Australia for the scarce diesel exhaust fluid.", "A federal government taskforce into the\u00a0critical shortage of AdBlue has struck a deal with Indonesia, after warnings from the transport sector that\u00a0Australia's supply could grind to a halt.", "Federal Trade Minister Dan Tehan said Indonesia's input could\u00a0stretch Australia's supply to February, while talks are ongoing with other Middle Eastern trade partners.", "A global shortage of urea \u2014\u00a0a key ingredient in AdBlue,\u00a0an important chemical used to remove pollution from the exhaust of diesel trucks \u2014\u00a0has caused China to cap its exports to protect its own supplies, fuelling AdBlue prices.", "Chief financial officer of SRH Milk Haulage, Ben Nix said prices have quadrupled in the past fortnight and stockpiles at the company's WA, Victorian and NSW depots \u2014\u00a0which would usually\u00a0carry about 9,000 litres \u2014\u00a0are near empty.", "\"We're down to effectively zero at each depot and we've just got to send our trucks to service stations to get it,\" Mr Nix said.", "\"It's very costly.", "\"That's just the cost of the product, let alone the time to send the drivers to the service.\"", "Mr Nix said the company, which runs 65 trucks across the country,\u00a0uses more than 300,000L of AdBlue a year.", "Mr Nix said he had found suppliers who could offer $1.80/L in about six to seven weeks.", "\"But obviously that's concessional to us based on the number of litres we use a year,\" he said.", "Mr Nix assured farmers, processors and consumers that they \"will always find a way to keep milk flowing\".", "\"It doesn\u2019t matter if it's bushfires, floods, droughts, COVID or a shortage of AdBlue.\"", "
ACCC 'liaising'\u00a0with government
", "Mr Nix would like to see the competition watchdog investigate the prices to ensure supply and freight businesses can stay on the road.", "\"It's something the ACCC should become involved in if there's such a shortage. There's just price gauging that appears to be happening,\" he said.", "The ACCC told the ABC it is speaking with the federal government \"about whether an authorisation is needed to allow diesel exhaust fluid producers to share information\".\u00a0", "\"If an application for authorisation is lodged it will consider it at that time,\" a spokesperson said.", "Mr Tehan said Australia was also in talks with many trading partners \"from\u00a0Saudi Arabia, to the United Arab Emirates, Qatar and also Japan\"."]
